channel.title: Extreme Revolution (317)
channel.description:
Current progress: ▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪
Cities:
[b]Varrock:100% Falador: 65% Edgeville: 100% Ardougne: 0% Seers: 35% Catherby: 0%[/b]
Mini Games: [b]Barbarian Assault:[/b] 20% Currently redoing all of it, since the game was a major glitch & lag source in the server.
[b]Castle Wars:[/b] 0% Removed the first one on the count of it was going off the server uptime, I set up a file for it to run off of just like in RuneScape to make it 20 minute long games, with 5 minutes waiting time.
Those are the only two minigame's I will be adding until I get everything completed.
[b]Server Source: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,391699.0.html]Devolution 2.7[/url][/b]
UftF: (Updates for the Future)
[b]► More Npc's with stability ► God War's ► Perfect God Sword special's, and stance. ► High Definition, with the correct looks.[/b]
►Got any more updates you would like me to add? Post them here and I will see what I can do.◄
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/2z5repx.gif[/img] Picture's:
[b]Client Background:[/b] [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/k9dlkj.png[/img]
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/2z5repx.gif[/img]

item.title: Extreme Revolution (317)
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

[quote=“cocoa, post:14, topic:297238”][quote author=Explisionist link=topic=393278.msg2931955#msg2931955 date=1251332027]

“High Definition, with the correct looks.”, yeh right? dont you mean HD textures.

It will be running on the normal 317 cache, along with the extended 525 HD cache which will be selectable from the game menu.
[/quote]
Proof.[/quote]

Okay, when I get the client finished i will show you it.

Read full topic

item.title: Extreme Revolution (317)
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

[quote=“b b0yz 4, post:4, topic:297238”]Offtopic: What is the client you are using?

Ontopic: Looks great! Keep it up and it will be awesome.[/quote]

Just a 317 debo, and added theme’s, etc…

[quote=“moh, post:7, topic:297238”]► High Definition, with the correct looks.
/You mean the shitty cache edits?[/quote]

No not the shitty cache edit’s, it will be the 525 HD cache added to it, I will edit it so it will work with the 317, and hopefully make it stable.

jeddac:

C’wars is 20 mins on RS

You are correct, but the game waiting time will be 23 minutes until the new game start’s, that way the waiting time/ grabbing the item’s, banking your reward’s, etc… Is faster.

Read full topic
